product_name: Eddyline Fathom LV Kayak with Skeg
long_description: A high-quality ABS kayak designed for small paddlers, this multi-day touring kayak has a tracking skeg, making it easy to keep your bow pointed to your next destination in strong wind and current.
short_description: A high-quality ABS kayak designed for small paddlers, this multi-day touring kayak has a tracking skeg, making it easy to keep your bow pointed to your next destination in strong wind and current.
